thread.title: The 25 Best Value Cities in the World
thread.title_full: The 25 Best Value Cities in the World

author: trivago
title: The 25 Best Value Cities in the World
text:
The 25 Best Value Cities in the World The Huffington Post 1 day ago trivago
Building your dream vacation can be a very expensive undertaking, especially if you plan on hitting some of the world's most famous sights and cities.
© Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443103212-1788454-Santiago_Credits_MunicipalidaddeVitacura.jpg To help travelers create a fun (and affordable) itinerary for 2016, trivago.com analyzed the world's most popular cites to determine which 25 destinations will get you more bling for less cha-ching in 2016. Take a look at the Top 10 - and, when you get the end, you'll see the whole of the Top 25 list.
Which incredible international city do you think snagged the #1 spot?
#10 - ROME, ITALY © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443103874-9967991-Rome_BiancaDelbao.jpg #9 - PRAGUE, CZECH REPUBLIC © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443104069-8126422-Prague_Claude1.jpg #8 - MEXICO CITY, MEXICO © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443104649-9260669-mexicocity_larsploughmannflickr.jpg #7 - BANGKOK, THAILAND © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443104266-5811545-bangkok3.jpg #6 - BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443104358-8404886-buenosairespixabay.jpg #5 - ISTANBUL, TURKEY © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443106375-3108137-Istanbul_JonE.jpg #4 - SANTIAGO, CHILE © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443103212-1788454-Santiago_Credits_MunicipalidaddeVitacura.jpg #3 - MOSCOW, RUSSIA © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443104797-6830443-moscow_StBasilsCathedral_Katherine.jpg #2 - ST. PETERSBURG, RUSSIA © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443103665-366288-stPetersburg_JohnP.jpg #1 - BELGRADE, SERBIA © Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-24-1443103030-6608700-Fotolia_66936132_Subscription_Monthly_XL_Belgrade_Serbia.jpg
© Provided by The Huffington Post 2015-09-25-1443173705-5401584-Top25.JPG
